qas.question: Where do organisms inherit their genes from?
How much of an asexual organism's genome is inherited from its parents?
How many copies of each chromosome does a sexual organism have?
How many sets of chromosomes does a sexual organism inherit from each parent?

answers.text: one complete set from each parent

qas.question: Why do sexual organisms have two copies of each chromosome?

answers.text: because they inherit one complete set from each parent
